item.title: Callie add a quote by Charlotte Brontë
Callie add a quote by Charlotte Brontë
item.description: "Good-night, my-" He stopped, bit his lip, and abruptly left me." -- Charlotte Brontë

item.title: Callie add a quote by Charlotte Brontë
Callie add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "You know you're in love when you can't fall asleep because reality is finally better than your dreams." -- Dr. Seuss
